verbs.description: Days before [ARG1: Trump tariffs on steel and aluminum] [V: take] [ARG2: effect] , negotiators for producing countries see themselves at the mercy of the president ’s whims .
Days before Trump tariffs on steel and aluminum take effect , negotiators for [V: producing] [ARG0: countries] see themselves at the mercy of the president ’s whims .
[ARGM-TMP: Days before Trump tariffs on steel and aluminum take effect] , [ARG0: negotiators for producing countries] [V: see] [ARG1: themselves at the mercy of the president ’s whims] .
